78.title: Crazy Man Brings Hognose Snakes into Vermont
78.plot: A man brings hognose snakes into Vermont, but Styx doesn't worry the alien species will take over the freezing-cold state.

80.title: Better Mental Health in Focus
80.plot: The mayor and police chief of Burlington, Vermont, announce that they want to focus on improving mental health.

85.title: Vermont State Government Wants Suggestions for Outdoor Economy: So Here It Is!
85.plot: Styx has two suggestions for improving Vermont's outdoor economy. Step 1: Fix roads and sidewalks. 2. Encourage citizens to garden.

86.title: Bald Eagles Back in a Big Way in Vermont
86.plot: Styx is happy to report that bald eagles are back in Vermont, and so are many other types of birds; but he warns that one could snatch your pet cat.

87.title: Vermont Senator Drives Drunk, Crashes, Gets DUI
87.plot: State senator Debbie Ingram is arrested for driving while drunk.

88.title: Vermont #1 for Breweries Per Capita
88.plot: Styx makes a note of Governor Phil Scott's illogical views on beer versus marijuana, while praising Vermont for its breweries.

89.title: No, Vermont Won't Likely Be the Next State to Legalize Marijuana
89.plot: Styx supports legalizing marijuana, but isn't holding his breath for Vermont to do it next.

90.title: State So Desperate for Substance Abuse Counselors It's Streamlining the Process
90.plot: Styx is surprised that Gov. Phil Scott is willing to cut some red tape to get more drug counselors.

91.title: We Were First on Civil Unions; Let's Be First on Other Things Too
91.plot: Vermont should take the lead on the drug war and gun rights, argues Styx.

92.title: On the Arrest of Rabbi Berl Fink
92.plot: Styx has mixed feelings about how the Vermont police handled the incident of the speeding rabbi.

93.title: Target Finally to Open Hideous Box Store in Burlington
93.plot: Styx is not thrilled by the new Target box store coming to Burlington.

94.title: Vermont SC Says Private Emails of State Employees Sometimes Public Records
94.plot: Styx is surprised that the Vermont Supreme Court's recent ruling was not already in effect.

101.title: Former Vermont AG's License Plate? '420'
101.plot: The former attorney general of Vermont, William Sorrell, takes "420" as a vanity license plate.

102.title: Halloween Scaremongering Through the Ages in Vermont and Elsewhere
102.plot: Halloween is scary, especially for parents buying into rumors about candy laced with PCP or apples with razor blades shoved inside.

103.title: The Great Vermont Power Outage of October 30th
103.plot: Styx explains why he didn't upload any videos in the morning: the power was out.

104.title: Happy Halloween to All of the Spooky State
104.plot: Styx wishes Vermont a Happy Halloween, while wondering what happened to hollowing out turnips.

105.title: Ignore the Politics, Vermont is Not Truly Far Left
105.plot: Styx explains how Vermont is not as far to the Left as some may think.

106.title: Episode #1.106
106.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

107.title: Vermont Man Shoots Moose, Chains it and Drags it Behind Truck
107.plot: A 20-year-old shoots a moose out of season, ties it to the back of his truck and drags it ten miles. Styx wonders if the guy is not all there.

108.title: 'Vermont Businesses for Social Responsibility' Push for New Taxes
108.plot: Vermonters are taxed more than enough, argues Styx.

109.title: Drunken State Senator Gets Probation
109.plot: A state senator who drives drunk gets off with just probation. A little cell time would have been better, argues Styx.

110.title: Co-Op Commies Go A Week Without Power
110.plot: Profit motives make things efficient, says Styx.

111.title: Bernie Sanders' Stepdaughter May Run for Burlington Mayor

112.title: Rutlander Wendy Wilton Appointed by Trump to Head Vermont Farm Service
112.plot: Styx has met Donald Trump's appointee to head the Vermont Farm Service and likes her.

113.title: Despite Being Screwed by Them Sanders Will Fundraise for the DNC
113.plot: Bernie Sanders is fundraising for the DNC, belying the claims that he wasn't a real Democrat and that his traitorous actions cost Hillary Clinton the election.

114.title: After Two Years, Only 11 Inmates Have Received Addiction Treatment
114.plot: Three million dollars has gone into drug addiction treatment for inmates, but after two years, only eleven of them have gotten any.

115.title: Memphremagog to Be Cleaned Up
115.plot: Vermont plans to clean up Lake Memphremagog, even though it's not that dirty to begin with.

116.title: Vermont Police Receive 300 Bulletproof Vests
116.plot: What would be a non-event in a crime-ridden state like Florida becomes newsworthy in Vermont, says Styx.

117.title: Vermont Wind Turbine Rules Still Dumb: Decentralize and Use Solar!
117.plot: Styx nixes the idea of inefficient, land-scarifying windmills in favor of solar panels.

118.title: Vermont Forces Towns to Spend on Roadway Upgrades for Wrong Reasons
118.plot: Vermont needs to repair the roads they have before they start spending money on things like reducing runoff, argues Styx.

119.title: Vermont Inmates Get Outsourced, Screwing Both Them and Us the Taxpayers

134.title: Ricin Discovered at Vermont Retirement Home
134.plot: Lots of headlines, but little information, emerge after ricin is discovered in a Vermont retirement home.

135.title: Vermont Warms 1.4 Degrees Since the 1970s
135.plot: The fear-mongering on climate change leaves Styx cold.

136.title: Ricin Case Update: It Was a Literal Crazy Lady
136.plot: A suicidal retirement home resident makes ricin from castor beans on the property, and plans to test it out on fellow residents before killing herself; but her plan is thwarted.

137.title: Phil Scott Opposes the GOP Tax Bill: LOL
137.plot: Phil Scott should go left on marijuana, right on fiscal issues, says Styx; but Scott is doing the reverse.

138.title: Howard Dean to Speak at UVM Tonight, LOL!
138.plot: Styx discusses the possibility of Howard Dean running for president again.

139.title: Rutland Board Bickers Over Maybe Cutting a Snow Plow Out of the Budget
139.plot: Styx says nix to Rutland reducing the number of snowplows, even by one, to balance the city budget.

140.title: Four Real Winners Arrested for Selling Cocaine Near a Police Station
140.plot: A group of drug dealers make things easy for the cops.

141.title: As Senate GOP Rushes Tax Plan, Sanders Wants a Shutdown: I Agree
141.plot: Styx agrees with Bernie Sanders that the government should be shut down, but not for the same reasons.

142.title: 'Infinite Culcleasure' Runs for Burlington Mayor as Socialist
142.plot: Styx is amused by the socialist DJ running for mayor in Burlington.

143.title: Burlington Claims Sanctuary City Status Adheres to Federal Law
143.plot: Styx reminds Burlington that sanctuary cities are illegal and depend on non-enforcement of the law.

144.title: Snow Has Arrived... Unfortunately
144.plot: Styx was hoping for a green Christmas.

145.title: Billings Farm and a Rant
145.plot: Styx talks about Billings Farm in Woodstock, Vermont, which is a tourist destination as much as it is a farm.

146.title: Yes, Wind Wrong for Vermont: Spencer Crispe is Right

147.title: Vermont Supreme Court So Goofy It Has to Ask What a Parent Is
147.plot: The Vermont Supreme Court struggles to define "parent". Styx announces that he may end the series after episode 150.

148.title: California Wants Ex Gov. Shumlin to Help with Single Payer
148.plot: Former Vermont governor Peter Shumlin is unlikely to do anything positive for California, argues Styx.

149.title: Marijuana Likely to Be Legalized as Phil Scott Joins Current Decade
149.plot: Styx thinks pot is a waste of money, but approves of the governor's belated plan to legalize marijuana.

150.title: Thus Ends the VT Series: The Best Sights of Our State

imdb.title: Vermont Issues
plot: The political commentator Tarl Warwick, aka Styxhexenhammer666, talks about news related to his home state of Vermont.::J. Spurlin
